title: Baby (Justin Bieber song)
summary: "Baby" is a song by Canadian singer Justin Bieber, alongside American rapper Ludacris. It was released as the lead single on Bieber's debut album, My World 2.0. The track was written by Bieber, Ludacris, Christina Milian, Tricky Stewart (who worked with Bieber on a previous single "One Time"), and R&B singer The-Dream, with production helmed by the latter two.
